frame.name: Influence_of_event_on_cognizer
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Situation</fen> or <fen>Protagonist</fen> creates conditions that push the <fen>Cognizer</fen> towards executing an <fen>Action</fen>, or which influence the <fen>Cognizer</fen> in an <fen>Activity</fen>. The words in this frame imply that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> actually does something.
<ex><fex name="sit">The murder of my brother</fex> <t>influenced</t> <fex name="cog">me</fex> <fex name="act">to study Law</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="sit">Her interest in history</fex> has largely <t>influenced</t> <fex name="cog">her</fex> <fex name="tiv">in her work</fex>. </ex>
<ex>Despite this huge variety, there were <fex name="sit">only two main factors that</fex> <fex name="deg">significantly</fex> <t>influenced</t> <fex name="tiv">the artist's work</fex>.</ex> <ex>Despite this huge variety, there were only two main factors that significantly <t>influenced</t> <fex name="cog">the artist's</fex> work.</ex>
<ex>Discuss <fex name="sit">the things that</fex> <t>guided</t> <fex name="cog">you</fex> <fex name="tiv">in making your decision</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Situation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Situation</fen> which motivates the <fen>Cognizer</fen> to execute the <fen>Action</fen>.
<ex><fex name="sit">The accident</fex> <t>influenced</t> him to drive slower.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Protagonist
FE.definition:
<def-root>A person or self-directed entity whose actions may potentially change the mind of the <fen>Cognizer</fen>.
<ex><fex name="pro">Van Gogh</fex> <t>influenced</t> Cezanne</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Cognizer
FE.definition:
<def-root>The sentient entity whose mind is moved in the direction of change.
<ex>Had that information <t>influenced</t> <fex name="cog">Fred Franz</fex>?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Action
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Action</fen> that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is influenced to do.
<ex>Everyone in the town also enjoyed her writing, which <t>influenced</t> her <fex name="act">to continue</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is influenced.
<ex><fex name="tim">Today</fex> the Koran <t>influences</t> the thinking of hundreds of millions of people</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the event (or state) which is not covered by more specific FEs, including epistemic modification (probably, presumably, mysteriously), and general descriptions comparing events (the same way).
<ex>I can't say that any single writer has <t>influenced</t> me <fex name="man">directly</fex>, that I'm aware of ...</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Activity
FE.definition:
<def-root>An activity (or domain) rather than a single, particular action that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is influenced in.
<ex>These works had a profound effect and <t>influenced</t> her <fex name="tiv">in the creation of a successful series capturing this sun-drenched region</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The extent to which a <fen>Protagonist</fen> or <fen>Situation</fen> influences the <fen>Cognizer</fen>.
<ex>Who <fex name="deg">significantly</fex> <t>influenced</t> the artist's life</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: guide.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to influence towards a specific action

lexUnit.name: influence((mass)).n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the capacity to have an effect on the character or behaviour of someone or something, or the effect itself

lexUnit.name: influence.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: factor which has an effect on someone so that they perform an action.
